name: Office Jerk: Judged!
description:
JUDGEMENT DAY
Why 'weight'? Get Office Jerk: Judged and whip a Dumbbell at his head!

The Jerk is getting out of the office and into your local stadium. He's landed a sweet gig as a sports judge - now he's an even bigger jerk. He's handing out rotten scores, and spending more time texting, reading and sleeping than judging. It's up to you to teach him a lesson, yet again!

Earn experience with every throw, and level up to get Bux. The better your score, the more experience you earn. If that's not enough, use special boosts and “Re-do's” to progress even faster!

Office Jerk: Judged includes Game Center, so you can complete achievements and compete for high scores with your friends!

What can you throw at this Jerk?

* Tighty Whitey Underpants
* Oversized Foam Finger
* Fully Loaded Hot Dog
* 2 Pound Dumbbell
* Classic Paper Ball

And more! Plus a mystery item - worth 25 points a hit - that might just be enough to “persuade” the Jerk to give those well-deserving athletes a decent score for a change!

Play Office Jerk: Judged today!

“Like” Office Jerk on Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/OfficeJerk

Get FREE in-game Bux when Office Jerk gets 100,000 “Likes” on Facebook!
______________________________

Office Jerk: Judged is brought to you by Fluik Entertainment, makers of wicked-fun mobile games such as Grumpy Bears, Plumber Crack and Streaker Run. Search the App Store for “Fluik” to browse all our games.

Follow @FluikGames on Twitter for awesome game announcements and other updates.

NOTE:
To help keep Office Jerk: Judged awesome, please send any bug reports or complaints directly to us, instead of posting them in your app reviews. You can post all your bugs or suggestions on the Facebook fan page, http://www.facebook.com/OfficeJerk, or email them to us at support@fluik.com
